pieces.text: LIRI, the Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface, is a command-line-interface (CLI) app built with Node.js. LIRI accepts four commands. The "concert-this" command searches the Bandsintown API for upcoming performances by the artist provided by the user. The "spotify-this-song" command queries the Spotify API for information about the user-specified song. The "movie-this" command searches the OMDB API for information about the user-specified movie. Results are printed in the console and also recorded in a '.txt' file.
